effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 577,011.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Dr. Scrapheal to heal your target additionally for 171,200.

When a nearby ally's health falls below 35%, Dr. Scrapheal springs into action, delivering instant care to heal them for 667,392. This effect can only activate once every 1 min.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,890 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 181 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
